text.div:
Tests by Microscopic Observation in Tissue by H&E or PAS Stain

This value set includes codes from the following code systems:

  • Include these codes as defined in http://loinc.org
    Code Display
    10800-1 Microscopic observation [Identifier] in Tissue by Periodic acid-Schiff stain with diatase digestion
    10801-9 Microscopic observation [Identifier] in Tissue by Phosphotungstic acid Hematoxylin (PTAH) Stain
    6665-4 Microscopic observation [Identifier] in Tissue by Hematoxylin and eosin stain
    6675-3 Microscopic observation [Identifier] in Tissue by Periodic acid-Schiff stain
